content.detailedDescription: Observed three red asynchronous flashing lights traveling in a straight line path.  darkness seemed to indicate a triangular shape with one light in front. lights flashed in no distinguishable pattern. the only object flew lower than most regularly observed aircraft. the sky was clear and a half moon nearly silhouetted the object. it was observed for only a few minutes before traveling out of sight.  a plane was observed a few minutes later.  it's engines were easily heard.
content.summary: Three red asynchronous lights in a triangle.  silent.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at my city sky line through binoculars facing east when i saw a interesting cloud formation over my left shoulder and turned to the north when 4 brushed aluminum looking craft shaped like footballs descended through the clouds from the northwest flying in a delta formation, and flew in a arc towards the south, giving off a vapor trail but was completely noiseless!
content.summary: Was looking at cloud formation through binoculars when 4 craft came into view in dalta formation!

content.detailedDescription: I was going to get my laundry mat across the street. after i finished up i began to proceed back across the street. i live not far from a little park. i saw a glowing orangish red object in the sky. i began to think it was a helicopter but no noise. i then ruled out plane because there weren't any signal lights and it just kinda sat there. i began to think it was a drone and i would prank my girlfriend and my next door neighbor. but the closer i got to my door the more and more i realized it wasn't a drone or low enough or close enough to be one. there were dark clouds moving in from the south south east direction and clear skies to the east. right where they met is where the object was. as i went to open the door it moved into the clouds and slowly vanished. soon as it did there was a huge lightning strike clear across the sky.It continued lightning one the most impressive lightning displays i've ever seen.
content.summary: Walking from the laundry mat and saw ufo

content.detailedDescription:
In the last week of july/first week of august 1998 i was attending a buddhist festival in conishead priory, ulverston, united kingdom. i have never spoken openly about this sighting before, but it has perplexed me over the years. i was 18 years old at the time of the sighting, attending the lamrim teachings and blessing empowerments of je tsongkhapa and dorje shugden with venerable geshe kelsang gyatso.

late at night, or possibly in the early morning hours, i was sitting on the grassy bank behind the temple, and was staring at the beautiful night sky. there is very little light pollution in this area, as it is located between the lake district national park, and the irish sea, so millions of stars are clearly visible to the naked eye, and i was enjoying the night sky. it was at this point that i witnessed a perplexing sight, which i have never been able to explain.

a bright and steady white light suddenly came into view in the far west of the night sky, moving at such a speed to the east that i initially thought it was a shooting star. the light, which was single, bright and constant, abruptly stopped mid flight directly in my sight, but slightly toward the south-east, having travelled in a completely straight line. the object did not remain in its stationary position for more than a moment, before travelling at the same incredible speed to the south-west night sky, where it disappeared from view. there were no other witnesses with me at the time. the distance of the object/light was hard to gauge, but my initially mistaking it for a shooting star may give some idea of possible distance. during all movements, the object travelled in a completely straight line.

i felt quite amazed and shocked by what i had seen, as i was previously dismissive of the likelihood of the existence of any aircraft which could move across the entire night sky in such a manner. i remember going through a mental check-list of possible explanations; a shooting star – no, it had a deliberate artificial change in trajectory, following a moment when it was entirely stationary. a laser beam – no, the night sky was entirely clear and cloudless, and the object appeared to produce rather than reflect light. an aeroplane – no, the speed was too fast and the trajectory impossible for any plane i had ever heard of. a satellite – no, the speed and trajectory were completely different. my experience left me with the knowledge that there are things which exist, which commonly offered explanations do not account for.

i am unlikely to discuss this sighting with many other people, but am happy to record it here, if it is of any interest to those who catalogue such matters.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light witnessed in clear night sky. travelled in straight line at rapid speed from west to east, stopped dead in sky then shot south-west.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were walking down by the water tower in stone harbor when my wife told me to look up that is when i saw 2 white lights traveling fast going east to west lights were going straight then they started to criss cross each other for about 10 seconds then made a sharp right turn and headed south and i lost sight of them after a few more seconds.
content.summary: 2 white lights criss crossing each other

content.detailedDescription: Seen an object gliding or flying in the air made no noise
content.summary: Outside to smoke and from the porch i seen an object almost gliding

content.detailedDescription:
The questions above really don't pertain to me as i only noticed this green thing in my pictures two days after.

i was on vacation, going to visit glacier natl park in montana.  we stayed in east glacier at a cabin the night before.  i've never been in the mountains before, so i went outside and took a few pictures of the mountain behind us.  i took 2 with my cell phone and 1 with my camera.

two days later as we were driving to yellowstone, as a passenger, i had time to look over my photos.  as i was going through them on my camera, i came across this picture, which i will attach.  

i must say, i kinda freaked out.  i zoomed in on the picture on my camera.  i couldn't believe what i was seeing, or i should say i'm still not exactly sure what i see. 

i guess i'm writing to you to see if there's a different explanation.  i know the sun is going down and was shining right in my lens when i took the picture.  but i definitely see a face in that green thing.

i should say i'm attaching another photo that i took with my cell phone before the picture with the camera.  it was probably only a minute or so before.  but in the cell phone picture, the "orb" is only a small circle.  then a minute or so later, it's what appears in my camera photo.

i should also mention when i was out there taking the pictures, there was absolutely nothing that i saw, no glowing object, nothing reflecting from the sun that i saw.  i am really interested in what experts have to say.

thanks.
content.summary: Green object in picture

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
August 8, 2016
approximate  time:  20:30 thru 21:00
fredericktown oh  43019


i was working in my yard and sat down for a break. i was watching a couple of chemtrails being stretched across the sky. the first going west to east the second going south to north.  i was facing north when i noticed a white object in the air over the farm across the road. at first i thought it was a drone. it appeared to stay in the same place. i watched for about 5 minutes. i also wondered if it was a weather balloon.  it was not windy. 

i went into the house to get my binoculars.  when i returned to the back yard  and looked where i last saw it, it was gone. disappointed, i sat down and was looking around and spotted it over my neighborhood, toward the east.     again it was stationary. i tried several positions for a steadier hand to for viewing. through the binoculars it was circular and a yellow orange around the edge. the center changed from this color to grays. by this time the sun had set.  for the most part this eliminated the reflection of the suns rays.

i felt there was communication between us. i asked for a sign. the cicadas started up and then was joined by a higher electric static noise. it was not pleasant to hear. it was a noise i had not heard before associated with the cicadas. the rest of the evening the cicadas were on the quiet side.  a thought crossed my mind that the noise was the sign. 

it was dusk. through the binoculars i watched it move toward a star that was only visible through the binoculars. it then moved below the star a short distance then continued on  its original path. it stopped just over a binoculars width   from the star and moved away from me.  without the binoculars these movements were not visible. by total darkness it had disappeared from my view.

occasionally it looked to have a “cloud” form around the top.

i feel that the triangle the stars formed and the smaller triangle that it went into had some significance. 

where distance seemed obvious in the beginning it was challenging at the end for comparison sake.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Is that a drone?

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation on milano marittima (rimini-italy) after gettin a girl to the hotel i was going back to my hotel walking on the beach. i sit down to smoke a cigarette when i notice no sounds at all, the sea completely flat and i saw a light lightbluewhite not very powerfull coming from south, at the first time i confused the light for a big bird (the were not moon and it was quite dark night) but when the light approach i saw it was a ufo circle bouncing over me.I did not believe it no sound at all, the ufo stay for 3 min. and then it disappeared at an unbelieveble speed to west direction.
i was looking at the sky when i noticed 5 brilliants stars on a line that were moving a little bit, suddenly the five lights start to cross between them very very fast and the they stop representing the five points of an pentagon. after 5 sec. the light move at the center of the pentagon and make a powerfull light for a cent of sec. and everything became normal.
i stay on the beach and after 15 min, i saw 2 helicopters and a plane rounding over the area.
the day after i noticed my watch was 15 minutes late.
this is thge first part, but after 1 week i went home in merate (como) italy and one night i was not able to sleep, when normaly i sleep like a child. i get up from my bed and lokk over the windows and i saw something that i confused for a small fire on a small forest close to my home.
i do not know why a got my car and went to the area where i saw the light. was not a fire, but inside of me i already knew it, was a orangered light like a transparent tube coming from the sky to the ground but i was not able to see th end on the sky.
inside of me appeared a thinking "go inside of the tube, go, go..."
but i knew  that if i was going inside of the tube i will never go back to see my son, so i run to the car and went home without looking back.
when home i looked from the windows and there was no light.
content.summary: Circle ufo came from south stay over my head form 3 to 5 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Observing possible tornado clouds south of the town rolla, nd with emergency crews.  took pictures of storm clouds along with video and noticed a glimpse to the right of me (south).  i initially stopped recording the tornado clouds and restarted recording the object heading into the storm clouds.

ruled out that it was plane or jet for we do not get many planes, other than "farm" planes for crop dusting.  i didn't mention anything to anyone i work with.  lost sight of the object once it entered the storm clouds.
content.summary: Ovalish white grayish object going from west to east into storm clouds

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Bright white object, teardrop with a slight bright pointed tail, moving very slow over the house.
i could hear a high flying jet nearby getting closer.  the object changed direction and sped up towards the jet, and spiraled around its nose, dipping up then down, then sped off se and seemed to slow down when it was over the city.  
the behavior of the bright object reminded me of a cat running out, jumping straight up to swat a toy and running off.
jet was travelling north/north east.
the object was the size of the front of the get from the wing to its tip, i was able to get a good size comparison when it spun around the jet.
the object came extremely close to the jet.  
my witness who was with me was recording it on a phone, but stopped recording before the jet interaction, as my fellow witness got a text message...Which apparently was way more important at that moment.
video is a typical light in the sky, the quality you expect from a phone in the evening on a distant object.  i will see if i can get my fellow witness to send it to me to upload on here later.
content.summary: Bright object teasing jet

content.detailedDescription: I was helping a neighbor on his shop outside, and observed a round object in the sw sky. there was some misty clouds in the area, but over all was blue sky. it seemed weird as i could tell it was round and just a dot. i thought it an aircraft or balloon. i went and got my binoculars and continued to watch to see if it moved. while watching you could see clouds moving but this object continued to stay stationary. eventually a jet liner passed by in the area but this object stayed at the same location. my neighbor and i watched for about an hour and sight was lost due to cloud cover. my binoculars only showed that object was round. i tried to steady my binoculars by leaning against a window frame, that helped a lot but did not show me any more than a round object. i could tell object was very far away, when jet liner flew past jet was very far too and object seemed even further. in all honesty i believed it to be a balloon, but it did not move the whole time, and remained stationary for aprox. the hour we observed.
content.summary: Observed a round stationary object in the sky for aprox 1 hour

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bike along the frontage by the i 40 freeway close to the inspection station in sanders, arizona. right at the begining of the navajo nation  borderline. looking along the horizon facing north is a ridge that has scattered anasazi ruins and that is the direction of the sunset.  before my bike ride i had one button of peyote and was very optimistic. a very high sense of well being and a cheerful and willingness to be charitable. ect. ect. i started taking pictures of the beautiful sunset at around 6:30 pm. i couldnt get enough. i love drawing landscapes. i couldnt wait to get home to look at the pictures. at this time people were mean and rude to me everywhere i went and  i just want peace. there was a family get together for my late grandparents. i wasnt invited. another reason for the bike ride... there was bad in my life but im obligated to be good. i was excited to look at my pictures. i got home tired and looked at any picture and thats when i first saw the green orb. my mind already said... "my picture ruined by a sprite can.The next morning,i eagerly look at the pictures. slowly but surely i began to notice things. i was at awe. i noticed that was not a sprite can. and it was moving! and theres a trail from which it came. when its followed it leads to a blurry shape purple disk in the sky. as i observed more. i see these transparent triangular objects with two black dots or windows that seem to observe me serval picture  before. and the appear as to watch as the green orb zigzags through the sky around the sun then goes right in front of me. the last sequential pictures shows the 2 triangles with the two dots inside hovering and are close to each other as a yellow illuminating yellow disk is in-between them. then the triangle s disappear then there is a red heart in the sky. im at awe.
content.summary: I ate peyote and went for a bike ride . in my thoughts are good thoughts about changing my life and contributing to the world... the sunset was oddand beautiful. i had a sense of being comfortable and very high on life. feeling really

content.detailedDescription: I was outside waiting for my wife looking up at the sky. i thought it was a cloud. it looked like a tear drop cloud that had a tail it was moving fast with no trail behind it. it went through the clouds in which i lost sight for a couple seconds and it punched thru the bottom of the clouds and it took a 90 degree turn and went south towards san francisco.
content.summary: I seen it coming down it was light out it was heading straight towards the ground and took a 90 degree angle and went thru the clouds like a bullet

content.detailedDescription: I was reading in the park around 10pm, enjoying the nighttime, when i looked up from my book and noticed a yellow light above the horizon. it looked relatively close to the treetops, but i assumed it was a plane coming in to land at the airport across the river, and that it was just an optical illusion. it was moving slowly, not necessarily coming towards me, rather rising into the sky. it quickly darted to the left a little bit, but it was such a small motion i figured i had just blinked at the wrong time. however, it kept repeating such a motion. it would rise a little bit, dart to the left or the right, hover in that position, then rise again. now i was beginning to think it was a drone (what kind of plane moves like that?), maybe a consumer one belonging to someone in the neighborhood because i still couldn't really gauge the size. as the craft continued its dart-hover-rise routine, it also began slowly moving southwest, diagonal of where i was standing. it eventually stopped its previous movements and just hovered for a bit before continuing on a steady southwest path. as it moved closer to me, i could see that there were four yellow lights in a row on the front of the craft, and two red, blinking lights on the back. still completely bewildered by what i was seeing, coupled with the craft's color matching that of the clouds overhead, i couldn't really make out its shape. yet as it moved closer to me, i could see that it was a flat, square or possibly rectangular object with four yellow headlights and two red taillights on the back corners. my phone had died when i got to the park, so i couldn't document what i was seeing. i did not notice any lights on the underside of the craft, and it never passed directly over to me. the craft continued moving southwest, and i lost sight of it when it became obscured by some trees. i thought i heard a very quiet, jet-like sound coming from it's direction, but i didn't notice it until it was at its nearest to me, and a lot of jets go by because of the city airport to the south so it may not have been the craft making that sound. i didn't feel strange or affected by the object, just absolutely bewildered by what i was seeing. when i first saw the lights i facetiously said to myself "what's if it's a ufo?" regardless of the object's nature, i'm pretty excited to have a cool story to tell people.
content.summary: Saw yellow lights in a row rise over horizon, lights would dart to left or right and hover, craft eventually began straight path to southwest.

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking to the night sky hoping to see a couple of meteors fall. to the east was a patch of lightning so i worked around the side of the house to see if there was a clear area to observe. the moon was very bright and next to it was a boomerang object that was displaying 5-6 lights blinking vertically. it was to bright to be a star and it was silently hovering just at the edge of the clouds. i then realized there was another identical one to the right of it. i then turned and saw another to the left of the moon and another directly over my home. i saw two planes fly through the sky but only one craft was moving, the craft directly above me was moving forward ever so slightly. all displaying the same lights and making no sound whatsoever. i banged on the bedroom window and asked my partner cuck to come observe with me and he did. we were both amazed. they stayed in the sky for about 20 minutes and then disappeared one after the other.

i was so excited! i have never witnessed something so incredible! i don't believe i will ever see anything as amazing again in my lifetime. unfortunately my cellphone was dead so i did not capture this amazing event on film or camera.
content.summary: I was looking to the night sky to the east was a path of lightning and 4 ufo's seemed to be hovering and making no sound above me house observing the same.

content.detailedDescription:
My cousin and i were heading towards colorado because it was the first stop on our road trip. i have experienced many ufo (alien space craft) sightings in my 20 years of life. i'm always looking up at the sky in the hopes of seeing more "ufos." i honestly believe that most of my sightings happened because i called upon them in my head or that it has something to do with my deep curiosity because ever since ive been doing this i've been getting more sightings.
i was driving and off in the distance i notice a so where hovering in between some clouds. i tell my cousin to try to get some pictures but they didn't come out right and the object kept being covered by clouds. well the closer we drive in that direction i keep calling out for someone if they can hear me that i want to learn and see more of the craft. eventually we drive on for around 20 mins when my cousins points out two orange floating orbs to my left. i quickly inspect them for flashing signal lights or wings and check its flight pattern to make sure it's not a plane. it was clearly 2 orange glowing sphere. i knew i had to get the video so i told my cousin to take the wheel while it was on cruise control so i could record it with a steady hand. i believe the light on the top right could be an airplane that flew by but the two orbs were just really hard to dismiss. could that really just be a plane on the top right?
we lost sight of it as we kept driving down the highway. it stayed in the same spot.
content.summary: 2 orbs over colorado

content.detailedDescription: I was in my driveway when i noticed a light and then it started moving i was standing with my gf who saw it too, then i took a video for a few minuets until it went out of view(behind a tree then after i went around the tree it was gone), it was not normal because of its aparent altitude and distance and the way it moved it wasnt a (rc style) drone it wasnt a plane or helicopter as it had no sound, and had no blinking lights(just a solid whiteis color) later i saw another one but it vanished over a second or so time space it went from bright to invisible. im not surprised, iv seen things before. its abnormal to me because there has been a large increase in military air presence in sturgeon bay, and there are no local bases(30+ miles away to nearest base) before the past few days iv never seen an f-16 in the air. or this many plans and helicopters. so i question the raised activity and the ufo at the same time. et or a military test or a person thing i dont know but hey gotta log it.
content.summary: Considering the recent spike in military air traffic in dc when no bases are close by weird.

content.detailedDescription:
Last saturday (8/6/2016) my wife took some pictures of sunrise with her mobile phone from my car near to lomas de zamora city. he took several pictures and one of this was published in facebook, then one of her friends sent us a message reporting  that she sees a strange object in the photo. then my wife and me reviewed all the photos and we believe that my wife took pictures of an atmosferic phenomenon or and ufo. we believe that you will be able to establish what type of thing was photographed.


i appreciate a lot your opinion about this issue. if you need further information, please let me know.

thanks in advance for your reply

best regards.

ruben corvalan 

pd: i send all the photographs in the same order that my wife took.
content.summary: We discover the probably ufo then analize in details some pictures
content.locationName: Lomas de Zamora, Buenos Aires Province

content.detailedDescription: Was watching some small cloud formations when i noticed a strange object hovering that appeared to be standing still. i got my wife and friend and our son to look at it when my friend ran to get binoculars and a telescope. we begin studying the object as it changed from what appeared to be a cicular object but it changed to a triangle shape then to a square with what looked like 4 cicular shapes within inside. we notified wvlt about the object and emailed them pictures of the object. after about an hour and a half the object slowly disappeared over the horizon.
content.summary: Was looking at small cloud formations when i noticed the object just hovering. got my friend and wife to look at it then went to get binoculars. observed the object until telescope arrived. looking thru telescope it papered to be of unknown origin . over

content.detailedDescription: This is the second blip i saw near the big dipper it was left of phecda the star and i am very happy now. it was bright white and flashed before it went poof. the plane was to the left and no where near it. i wish i had more to say. this is the best night of my life because they came back!
content.summary: One quick blip about 4 inches away from the lower middle of the big dipper

content.detailedDescription:
Wow this was a shocker.  i went out onto my balcony just before 9pm at night on aug 9, 2016 to take pictures of nice sunset in an otherwise clear blue sky but soon long thin domes of black clouds started to appear here and there, slim in wide but a little domed in the middle.  some would fade and others appeared but no lights or anything else.  
then all of a sudden i noticed these black forms forming on top of dark strips of clouds over the reddish orange clouds of the sunset and the forms almost looked like a little cityscape, like black forms of buildings.  i got a picture but have to develope this film.  through a set of good binoculars they were pretty strange.

i kept watching the sky because something seemed so odd about all the formations i saw so far and notice little white dots moving here and there and assumed them to be small planes over quebec, across the river from ottawa.  i saw one of those bright white dots before, during and after the sighting of the large oval form i will tell you about next.

the night was very warm and humid.  i all of a sudden realized that another type of cloud was forming in the north east over the river more than over quebec and it seemed to be in the shape of an arc, made out of white/grey clouds in an otherwise clearer blue sky in that area.  the black thin clouds were in the background, not near this arc.  the white cloudlike arc was just a half an arc but huge, took up half the sky it seemed and i watched it as it started to change more.  from that bottom half an arc made of light whiter clouds there seemed to radiate several, maybe 5 long ray like lines that went up into what seemed like a centre of something.  you still couldn't see a total form of what now looked like a huge disc but you had the feeling that the form was definitely there.

then i realized, just out of nowhere that this thing was moving.  i thought ti was stationary then as i watched it i noticed that it was in fact slowly moving as a huge mass southward and over my apt building.  at that point i also notice that above the white arc that made up what seemed to be the bottom of something the whole middle area was in fact much darker than the sky around it.  that is when i started to freak a bit.  i also notice what i think was a sort of vibrating inside me although i didn't hear that sound i felt i should have due to this sense of vibration and the size of this thing moving over my neighbourhood.  i got a few pictures of it but it was so massive i couldn't get it all in the frame and again have to get these films developed.

it was getting dark out but the whole event lasted about 45 minutes from the first time i noticed the whitish clouds that formed the bottom arc start to appear, they weren't there before, to when the massize object moved to the south and disappeared - moved very slowly.  i honestly think that i just saw a mothership.

the way the whole centre was darker than the sunset sky around it, it all stayed in one huge shape, the oval bottom that was first to appear was out of place in the night sky with the other clouds black and disappating and then some appearing but this huge object stayed the same and appeared solid.  i never saw any lights on it and the white rays i saw on it at first that went into the middle of the object slowly disappeared after a bit.  for a minute in the middle of the sighting i think i saw a centre that was lighter than the rest - almost like the the whitish grey of the clouds that formed that bottom arc.

because of the heat here there were lots of air conditioners going that interfered with any sound it might have made but like i said before i am sure i felt a vibration as it went over but can't be 100% sure.  i just seem to sense a deep vibration.

i am a bit shaken up from this sighting because it all just seemed to form out of nowhere and before i knew it there it was and moving slowly out of sight.  it was huge and you got a powerful feeling from it.  i have had other sightings of various ufos in this same area over the years, all different.  something is definitely going on in this area.

i got the feeling that the majority of this huge object was cloaked or invisible in some way.  none of it dissipated at all from the first i saw of it forming as that cloudlike arc.  the centre was definitely much darker though like i said compared to the darker blue of the sky around it.
content.summary: After observing strange straight thin domed black clouds after bright sunset noticed in a clear blue sky near sunset a white arc type cloud forming then realized the arc stayed firm but light shots of white almost rays went into the centre of a huge oval

content.detailedDescription: I've been searching for days online looking for what i saw walking to a grocery store a block a way about 3pm ,08/02/2016 a little cloudy, sunny and breezy. i took a short cut as everyone in the neighborhood does thru the alley where apartment garages are. i heard the same noise as always of a jet passing fast that nobody ever sees. i looked up to see if i can see what makes this noise other than at my house looking. what i saw starting from a garage rooftop was a snake shaped smokey figure moving like a snake towards the sky. it was about 5-6 feet long maybe 5-6 inches wide. i stared at it wiggling up for 10-15 seconds then the clouds in the sky in the background blended with the snake figure that i couldn't see it anymore. i remember someone telling me this before. i found out it was my son and his now ex girlfriend. he and her saw the same thing but maybe another block a way behind the buildings of a shopping center of the grocery store i was going to that day. his sighting was about 3 years ago.Has anyone seen something like this????
content.summary: Solid smoke shaped snake 5-6 ft 5-6 in wide slithering upward from garage roof top about 330pm 8/2/16 lil cloudy sunny breezy

content.detailedDescription: i took my son to lee high school around 12 o'clock noon to register for school. while he was inside i decided to take a couple pictures of the sun. after about 10 shots of it and looked at my photos and i saw what i saw was kim trails from a plane. after zooming in for a closer look i noticed that there was no chemical trails
content.summary: Took my son to the high school in san antonio to register for school while he was inside i was outside in my car took a picture of the sign and this is what came on my photo

content.detailedDescription: Objets very luminous like sun,  very big above city, running north to southwest very slowly. you can see small trails behind the objects
content.summary: Description after

content.detailedDescription:
This event was witnessed by my wife and 8 year old daughter. 

last sunday 8/7/16, my wife, and my 2 daughters (8 and 5 years old), and myself went to the beach at coney island 2 blocks from my house at about 11;30am-12pm.  we set up our blanket and since my kids were relaxing on the blanket, i decided to go for a swim for 5-10 minutes.  when i got out of the water we started eating something.  my wife then asked if i saw the objects in the sky and i said that i did not.  this was around 1pm. 

she described about 5 to 6 (my daughter said 6) needle or rod shaped metallic objects which were flying in formation at high altitude.  several were reflecting the sunlight and the others were dull. it was a beautiful sunny day with few if any clouds.  they were very high as some planes appear when they fly at high altitude (much higher than the planes we see taking off and landing at nearby jfk airport).  

they were flying in formation heading east with three in the front side by side with the other two rows behind with objects moving but to the east but with simultaneous lateral movements.  the formation itself did not deviate from the movement to the east. 

the speed at which they were flying appeared to be high.  the movement across the sky was similar to the movement across the sky the planes taking off and landing at jfk were doing, except the planes were a lot closer and come in out of the south.  

the attached sketch was drawn by my wife later that evening.  
the object below is the reference of the top of our beach umbrella.  the objects appear as the small lines at the upper left hand of the sketch.  the middle shows an enlargement. 
 

neither of us have ever witnessed a ufo in the past (i wish i had seen these).  she insists that they were not birds.
content.summary: Six rod or needle shaped metallic appearing objects flying in formation at high altitute flying east in formation with simultaneous lateral movements of some of the objects

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were sitting in the hot tub to look at the stars. we have a pretty good view of the flight paths of the planes that fly over to the local airport and the ones that head across the ocean.  we have spotted many satellites and planes at many different altitudes over the years.  this night the sky was clear and the milky way was slightly visible.   when we first spotted the ufo it was approaching from the north west west horizon. where it approached from it had the setting sun and the thin crescent moon (which both had set) well behind it so we were both surprised that it was so bright at such a spot in the sky.  as it approached us and got more overhead i noticed that it was making a large slow arc towards the east.  it was larger than any star in the sky and brighter than any satellite i've ever seen.  it didn't loose any of its brightness until it was almost above the horizon to the east.  it did not seem to drop towards the horizon like a plane does when it flies out of sight.  shortly after we lost sight of it there started lightening flashes in the direction that it disappeared.  we didn't hear any thunder or see any clouds the whole time were were outside.
content.summary: Bright light bigger than a satellite or star  approached from horizon and slowly arced as it traveled across sky

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my backyard close to lake erie i saw a flash than a burning in the sky. it appeared to be a fireball that just hoovered over the lake first time i've seen this when tge sun was up in the sky.It disappeared and reappeared. i felt positive energy from the siteing was this the lions gate?
content.summary: Ball of fire falling from the sky over lake erie in eastlake, it stopped hovered than went back up

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside smoking and stargazing at around 11.10 pm on monday 8th of august 2016 when i saw a bright localized flash in the sky around 70 degrees above horizon towards the north of sion, switzerland. at first, i thought it was the navigation lights of an aircraft that i hadn't noticed before although the flash i saw was much bigger than ones usually produced by navigation lights. however, after scanning the sky around that region, i was not able to see any aircraft. 

this was followed shortly by the appearance of a bright satellite-like object moving across the sky from west to east in the same general area of the sky. it was about as luminous as the iss when it passes by in the sky and was definitely more luminous than normal satellites. it disappeared within 2-3 seconds. my attention was then drawn towards what looked like a star in that same region of space. however, it turned out to not be a star at all as it randomly shifting around its initial position when i first saw it. it would go up and down, and move sideways in a smooth path. it was witnessed by another person who could swear that it periodically also glowed orange around the white dot that we could both see. i did not see that orange glow at any point but that might have to do with my vision not being perfect despite wearing glasses.

the random motion of the white dot continued for a good 15 mins before i decided to head back inside my home. when i came back out 10 minutes later, i could not see the moving dot anymore but i did see random flashes and two shooting stars in the same area of the sky.
content.summary: Bright flash in the sky, then starlike object appears high in the sky and moves about randomly.
